text:
Living in a foreign country comes with its own set of challenges, and being involved in a car accident only adds to the stress. Thankfully, we were fortunate to have been referred to a highly reliable repair shop by our insurance. Their coordination was excellent, and we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a smoother experience.

Joyce, in particular, stood out. She was a fantastic communicator‚Äîalways prompt, clear, and consistent with updates regarding the progress of our settlement after we were rear-ended by a company van. The repair work itself was seamless and completed much faster than we expected.

From start to finish‚Äîcoordination, payment processing, rental car arrangement, and the repair itself‚Äîthe entire process was handled professionally and efficiently. We are extremely satisfied with the service and highly recommend this shop, especially Joyce!

Excellent service from Joyce and team. Vehicle got hit & run by a company vehicle, Joyce assisted in contacting the culprit company for insurance claim. Culprit company ended up uncontactable so had to pay out of pocket, but pricing was fair and transparent. Fast and quality service üôè

Aftersales service is solid. There was abit of panel gap for my front bumper and Darren (he has a very good attitude and very customer service oriented) did the rectification immediately. No complains. Very happy with Darren's service. 100% recommended. Quick and solid job. Thank you again Darren!

Would like to commend Joyce highly for her outstanding professionalism and service. Being our first accident encounter it was quite a bad experience and having to navigate this insurance
reporting and negotiation with the other party. Super thankful for Joyce as she helped us understand the circumstances better and aided us greatly through out the process. It was service we wouldn‚Äôt have expected and gave us peace of mind on next steps. Thank you Joyce!

Had problem with my car battery that couldn't start the car properly.  Happened to chance upon Complete VMS where I met Darren, who is very helpful and knowledgable to explain the reason behind car battery drainage due to dash cam recording.  Drove off after battery replacement, but car vibrates.  He immediately knows where the problem lies and quickly solve it.   Very satisfied with his/his team service.
